titleStmt.title: The act anent the setling of measures and weghts co[n]cluded at Edinburgh the 19 day of Februar 1618 yeeres. by the Co[m]missioners having power to doe the same by Act of Parliament made the twentie eight day of Iune 1617
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: Scotland.

notesStmt.note: Caption title; at head of page: God, and my right in my defence.
Reproduction of the original in the New York Public Library.
